sourcesContent: import React, { useState } from "react" const Edit = () => { const [value, setValue] = useState({ name: "", email: "", age: "", mobile: "", work: "", add: "", desc: "", }) const { id } = useParams("") const [employee, setEmployee] = useState([]) const setdata = (e) => { console.log(e.target.value) const { name, value } = e.target setValue((preval) => { return { ...preval, [name]: value, } }) } const getemployee = async () => { const res = await fetch(`/employee/${id}`, { method: "GET", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", }, }) const data = await res.json() if (res.data === 422 || !data) { console.log("error") } else { setEmployee(data) } } React.useEffect(() => { getemployee() }, []) return (
